org.jhotdraw.samples.svg.figures
Interface SVGFigure

All Superinterfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, DOMStorable, Figure, java.io.Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
SVGEllipse, SVGGroup, SVGImage, SVGLine, SVGPath, SVGRect, SVGText
public interface SVGFigure
extends Figure

SVGFigure.

Method Summary
 boolean isEmpty()
          Returns true, if this figure is empty for one of the following reasons: A group has no children A path has less than two points An ellipse or a rectangle has a width or a height of 0 A text has no characters

Method Detail

isEmpty

boolean isEmpty()
Returns true, if this figure is empty for one of the following reasons:
  • A group has no children
  • A path has less than two points
  • An ellipse or a rectangle has a width or a height of 0
  • A text has no characters
